page.title: 18SPORT (CONT)
page.content:
Though Grantham has a town team which plays in the Midland League and used to be of even higher status in the Premier League North, its teams in this area are the ones who actually have their ground in the survey area.
Harrowby United play close to the Alma Park and have a place in the Midlands Regional alliance. This 1985 season to date they have the following playing record; Played 11 won 4, drawn 3, lost 4. They have 11 points and are placed 7th in the League table . Three points behind the leaders from a Nottingham district side and ten points clear of the bottom placed club from Derbyshire.
Another local team Grantham United have a similar number of points but are slightly higher placed because of
